message.name: ERR_TASK_RESERVE_OF_CLOSED_TASK
message.locale: You cannot reserve a closed task.

message.name: ERR_ALREADY_RESERVED_BY_YOU
message.locale: This task is already reserved by you.

message.name: ERR_ALREADY_RESERVED_BY_OTHER_USER
message.locale: This task is already reserved by another user.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: This task is not reserved and therefore cannot be unreserved.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_MODIFY_TASK_CLOSED
message.locale: A task with a status of closed cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_INSUFFICIENT_MODIFY_TASK_PRIVILEGES
message.locale: The task can only be modified by the user it is reserved by.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_TASK_MINS_WORKED_GREATER_ZERO
message.locale: The number of minutes worked must not be less than zero.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_TASK_HOURS_WORKED_GREATER_ZERO
message.locale: The number of hours worked must not be less than zero.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_TASK_MINS_GREATER_THAN_MAX
message.locale: The number of minutes cannot be greater than 59.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_REALLOCATE_TASK_CLOSED
message.locale: A task cannot be re-allocated if it has a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_XRV_TASK_STRATEGY_MANUAL
message.locale: You cannot allocate a task with an allocation strategy of manual.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_XFV_TASK_FORWARDING_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: Forwarding of this task is not permitted.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_USER_NO_MODIFY_PRIVILEGES
message.locale: You do not have the required privileges to modify this task.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_USER_NO_CLOSE_PRIVILEGES
message.locale: You do not have the required privileges to close this task.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNMENT_FORWARDTO_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must select a name for this type to forward the task to.

message.name: ERR_DEFAULT_WORKFLOW_QUEUE_PROPERTY_NOT_SET
message.locale: The default workflow queue specified by the property %1s has not been set. This must be specified so that tasks that cannot be allocated by any other means may be assigned to it.
